summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeColourPop's Stone Cold Fox Palette features 30 cool-toned matte and metallic shades to take your look from everyday neutral to ultra-dimensional glam.
details: DetailsBenefitsHighly pigmentedSuper blendableApplies evenlyLong-lastingItem 2579656How To UseApply with your favorite shadow brushes. Flat and firmer brushes will give the most color payoff. Fluffier brushes are great for blending. Use a small angled brush to line the eyes.IngredientsDrama Mama, Fickle Fate: Boron Nitride, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Phenoxyethanol, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Magnetic Moon: Dimethicone, Silica, Lauroyl Lysine, Polyethylene, Magnesium Myristate, Boron Nitride, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Ptfe, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Iron Oxides (Ci 77499), Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Gneiss Guy, So Fine, Mystery, Baby Doll: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Magnesium Myristate, Lauroyl Lysine, Boron Nitride, Silica, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Tin Oxide. May Contain: Aluminum Powder (Ci 77000), Carmine (Ci 75470), Ferric Ferrocyanide (Ci 77510), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Caving In: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Ptfe, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Magnesium Myristate, Lauroyl Lysine, Jojoba Esters, Phenoxyethanol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylyl Glycol, Silica, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Acacia Decurrens Extract, Polyglycerin-3, Dimethicone, Bismuth Oxychloride (Ci 77163), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499), Mica (Ci 77019), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).For Granited, Truffles, Play It Coal, Dreamfull: Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Boron Nitride, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Zinc Stearate, Dimethicone, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Tin Oxide. May Contain (+/-): Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Mica (Ci 77019), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Sediment To Be, Hard Place, I Dig It: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Lauroyl Lysine, Boron Nitride, Silica, Dimethiconol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tin Oxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol. May Contain: Blue 1 Lake (Ci 42090), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Mica (Ci 77019), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035), Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891).Enigma, Rumor Mill, Lux, Fascinated, Obsidian, Trip, U Rock, Cult Clastic, Bould Type, Stone Age, Stranger, Ghost Town, Rock Bottom: Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Talc, Boron Nitride, Zinc Stearate, Lauroyl Lysine, Magnesium Stearate, Dimethicone, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dimethiconol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Triethoxycaprylylsilane. reviews.headline: May want to buy it in store then order it online
reviews.comments: This is not about the product itself. I ordered the pallet online and some of the eyeshadows were already broken when I opened it.

reviews.headline: The BEST smoky palette!!
reviews.comments:
The thing that drew me to this palette was the cool tone browns, something I couldn't find at the pricepoint of ColourPop. Every shade is gorgeous and blends easily for the perfect smoky eye!
I've been using another palette by the brand, and I love the formulations because the pigment is amazing. I use an eyeshadow primer which is THE KEY to a long-lasting, creaseless look. It all prevents fallout and drastically improves blending and pigment.
Overall, this palette is amazing and at this price, it can't be beat. (Plus it's made in the US)

reviews.headline: Wnat a wonderful Palette!!
reviews.comments: I purchased the Colourpop Stone Cold FoxMega Eyeshadow Palette about a year ago and I'm so glad I did!! Wonderful cool shadow palette with gorgeous shades!! I have warm skintone and Ivory com[lexion but I had not one eyeshadow palette with cool tonesand felt I should be open to experimenting with these shades. I'm so glad I have and will continue to usethis palet. The shades oar goreous, won defully blendable and theshimmers are gorgeous!! Iuse yepiemr and I highly ecommend you do as well. Te YX eye primer and teNYX G,itterG,ueand both wellpricedand worth every penny!! I ha nowpurchased sixmore Colourpop Mega Eyeshadow Palettes and adore evry one of them So imp[ressed with these eyeshasow palettes!!!

reviews.headline: good
reviews.comments: has some fallout and smudging but overall very good

reviews.headline: Very disappointed
reviews.comments: All the colors look very similar in the palette and they all look exactly the same when swatched. I also had a shimmer that was completely broken when I first opened the box. Not worth the money.

reviews.headline: so pretty and easy on the eyes
reviews.comments: love the color choices.

reviews.headline: Awful Payoff & Very Loose
reviews.comments: Not sure how this has such a high rating since the color payoff is awful for this palette compared to other brands I have. It also had eyeshadow loose and dusted on the inside when it got to me (despite the plastic film covering the pots). The white shade Dreamful looks matte in both the palette preview and on all the models' arms on this site, but somehow it's a shimmer? Wish I'd watched a review video for this like I normally would've because it's a terrible formula.

reviews.headline: This review is specifically for Ulta and not the palette
reviews.comments: My palette arrived looking like every shade was going to be smashed to dust inside. Somehow by the grace of god, it was fully intact… Just incredibly dirty.

reviews.headline: Love ColourPop products!!!
reviews.comments: Pretty colors! Very pigmented.

reviews.headline: Great value
reviews.comments: Great value for good quality eye shadow

reviews.headline: Favorite eyeshadow palette at this price point
reviews.comments: Wish I'd discovered it sooner!! It's perfect if you're cool toned. Great color payoff and variation.

reviews.headline: I love this eyeshadow palette
reviews.comments: I love this palette!!  The colors are pretty and the eyeshadows last all day with no fading and creasing. I bought the smaller pallets and I love them as well.

reviews.headline: I would absolutely buy this product again
reviews.comments: LOVE IT!!!

reviews.headline: My new favorite palette! ❤️
reviews.comments: The colors are so pigmented. Variety of great colors in one palette. Definitely will be buying again!

reviews.headline: Excellent palette
reviews.comments: This is a wonderfully versatile palette, and I always receive compliments when I use it.  The dark colors have relatively little fallout, which is surprising. Excellent value for the money.  My coloring is cool. however there are warm shades here too.

reviews.headline: Tried to like it but couldn't
reviews.comments: I wanted something new because Ive become stagnant with eye makeup. The texture of this eyeshadow did not blend well for my lids. I use primer to prep and the colors didn't blend seamlessly, the transition from crease to outside corner lid was choppy

reviews.headline: Love this palette
reviews.comments: I was kind of scared because of the reviews but this palette was pigmented and I didnt experience any fallout, I would recommend you use an eyeshadow primer

reviews.headline: Loved it so much I repurchased!
reviews.comments: A few years ago I was stuck in a warm tone rut. I have a neutral skin tone and wanted to try out some cool tones to see what the hype was about. At first I wasnt a fan but once I worked out a few looks, the new looks atarted to flow. I really loved this pallette. This pallette, a good warm tone paette and some travel or magnetic pallettes and you're good to go! This is a solid everyday day-to-night winner.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: I love the pigment and the way it just glides on

reviews.headline: Disappointed
reviews.comments: I thought this would be my new favorite because the colors story is beautiful. However, they are lack luster on the eyes and blend away. I find i need to layer to get them to show up and that is why i dont use as often as i thought i would.

properties.name: Describe Yourself

values.label: Light skin with neutral undertones & small eyes
41, blue eyes, ash blonde hair, fair skin, look

display_values: 41, blue eyes, ash blonde hair, fair skin, look
Light skin with neutral undertones & small eyes

media.headline: This review is specifically for Ulta and not the palette
This review is specifically for Ulta and not the palette

faceoff_positive.comments: I've used many different palettes over the years, from the famous ABH Modern Renaissance palette to cheap little Almay trios. This palette is one of the best I've used. I love that there are so many cool tones in this, which has been very hard to find since 2019. Most of the colors are very nice and easy to blend. A few shades do not have much pigment to them. The black can also feel a little chalky and doesn't seem to last all day if used as eyeliner. One thing that kind of annoys me is that some of these shades are so similar to another in the palette that it's fairly redundant to include both. Aside from these very minor issues, I've been very happy with it and have used it almost every day since purchase. The Colourpop formula isn't my favorite - my first foray into Colourpop eyeshadows was the Sailor Moon collab, which was not great - but I've been pleased enough with the formulations here.
faceoff_positive.headline: Mostly a solid palette

faceoff_negative.comments: I'm a cool toned girl which is why this pallette made me very excited. But oh my gosh was I dissapointed, so much fallout when even you barely touch pan. Then the color pay off is so light that you reaply havento paxk it on to see any pay off. A lot of the colors are also very similar to each other, they could have totally put more variety but its just so boring and bland. It just isnt for me, it was a totaly waste of my money. I usually love colourpop but this formula is just to powdery and doesnt have that same buttery feel when you apply. Just dont do it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Don't waste your money
